item.description:
The Young Professionals group used to hold their meetups at Felt Boston. It is a nice venue (4 stars on Meetup) and does not get really crowded until after 10PM. People can stay as late as they want but we will start gathering at 8PM.

The event will be completely unstructured, just an opportunity to meet new people in an informal setting. Felt also has pool tables on the second level. Please RSVP so that I know how many people to expect.

We will take over as much of the second floor as we can. Go up the stairs by the entrance to join our group.
item.how_to_find_us: We will take over as much of the second floor as we can. Go up the stairs by the entrance to join our group.

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Saturday Night at Felt Boston
